thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Reviewing the Products that Don’t Need Reviews

author: Joe Queenan
title: Reviewing the Products that Don’t Need Reviews
text:
Like most people, I am constantly asked by merchants to review products or services. I get asked for feedback regarding concerts, art exhibits, restaurants, visits to state parks. I am routinely asked to review thermal socks, souvlaki and how well the check-in went at the hotel in Mount Laurel, N.J. All that is fine.
But the other day HP...
